title: Boss In The Streets And (Currently) Meh In The Sheets w/ Rachel Lindsay
description:
What do you do if you’re in a place where you’re madly in love with your partner, your career, your life...BUT you've also decided to put your sex life on the backburner…or maybe more accurately, in the fridge? Rachel Lindsey, the first African-American Bachelorette, sits down with Shan to unapologetically talk about her loving marriage and how it's far removed from the Fantasy Suite. Then, Shan gets Jared’s take on their current sex life...or lack thereof.


Follow Shan on Instagram: www.instagram.com/shanboody
Join Shan’s mailing list: www.shanboodram.join

Follow Rachel Lindsey on Instagram: www.instagram.com/therachlindsay
Buy Rachel’s new book “Miss Me With That” wherever you buy your books or audio books

Follow Jared Brady: www.instagram.com/enjoyjaredbrady
Listen to Enjoy the Podcast on the same platform you are listening to this podcast
